channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: New: flake8-import-linter (0.1.11)
item.description: Flake8 plugin that checks for forbidden imports in your code
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-import-restrictions (2.0.1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin used to disallow certain forms of imports.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-logging (1.1)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin that checks for issues using the standard library logging module.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-all-not-strings (0)
item.description: flake8 plugin which checks that modules under `__all__` are defined as strings
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: nitpick (0.34)
item.description: Enforce the same settings across multiple language-independent projects
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-github (1.0.1)
item.description: Flake8 formatter for GitHub Actions
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: pandas-vet (2023.8.2)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to lint pandas in an opinionated way.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: pandas-vet (2023.8.1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to lint pandas in an opinionated way.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-internal-name-import (1.0.1)
item.description: flake8 plugin that reports imports of internal names
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-multiline-function-call-equals (0.1.2)
item.description: A package that checks to ensure spaces around `=` in multiline function calls
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-internal-name-import (1)
item.description: flake8 plugin that reports imports of internal names
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-django (1.4)
item.description: Plugin to catch bad style specific to Django Projects.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: pyflakes (3.1)
item.description: passive checker of Python programs
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8 (6.1)
item.description: the modular source code checker: pep8 pyflakes and co
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-private-name-import (1)
item.description: flake8 plugin that reports imports of private names
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: pycodestyle (2.11)
item.description: Python style guide checker
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-staged-diff (0.3)
item.description: flake8 wrapper to run only on modified/staged code
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: autoflake8 (0.4.1)
item.description: Tool to automatically fix some issues reported by flake8 (forked from autoflake).
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-private-name-import (0.1.5)
item.description: flake8 plugin that reports imports of private names

item.description: flake8 plugin that reports imports of private names

item.description: flake8 wrapper to run only on modified/staged code

item.description: Typing stubs for flake8-rst-docstrings

item.description: Typing stubs for flake8-docstrings

item.description: Typing stubs for flake8-builtins

item.description: Typing stubs for flake8-typing-imports

item.title: Updated: types-flake8-bugbear (23.7.10.1)
item.description: Typing stubs for flake8-bugbear
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-boolean-trap (1.0.1)
item.description: flake8 plugin which forbids boolean positional arguments
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-aaa (0.16)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin that checks Python tests follow the Arrange-Act-Assert pattern
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-type-checking (2.4.1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin for managing type-checking imports & forward references
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-classmethod-staticmethod (2)
item.description: flake8 plugin that checks rules regarding the staticmethod and classmethod decorators.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-import-restrictions (2)
item.description: A flake8 plugin used to disallow certain forms of imports.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-typing-collections (2)
item.description: A flake8 plugin that checks the use of type alternatives from the typing module over actual run time types, especially from the collections module.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-multiline-conditionals-comprehensions (2)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to make sure complex conditional expressions and comprehension expressions are split over several lines.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-eol (0.0.8)
item.description: Flake8 plugin to enforce Unix/Linux EOL consistency
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-docstrings-complete (1.2)
item.description: A linter that checks docstrings are complete
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: pytest-flake8-path (1.5)
item.description: A pytest fixture for testing flake8 plugins.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-comprehensions (3.14)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to help you write better list/set/dict comprehensions.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-bugbear (23.7.10)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding likely bugs and design problems in your program. Contains warnings that don't belong in pyflakes and pycodestyle.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-tidy-imports (4.10)
item.description: A flake8 plugin that helps you write tidier imports.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: types-flake8-bugbear (23.7.10)
item.description: Typing stubs for flake8-bugbear
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-no-pep420 (2.7)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to ban PEP-420 implicit namespace packages.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-module-docstring-import (0.0.1)
item.description: Very simple flake8 plugin checking if there is exactly one new line between module docstring and imports
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-mock (0.4)
item.description: Provides checking for non-existent mock methods
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-json (23.7)
item.description: JSON Formatting Reporter plugin for Flake8
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pyi (23.6)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 to enable linting .pyi stub files.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-django-migrations (1)
item.description: Flake8 plugin to lint for backwards incompatible database migrations
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)
